attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fuel prices are slowly creeping up again.
I think its about time that the government lowerd tax on fuel as we pay an astronomical percentage as tax, where as the US fuel taxes are significantly lower.
I think the government makes too much money out of motorists, for example, speed cameras, fines and again, fuel tax!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
